hadiths.text: It was narrated from Safiyyah bint Shaibah, from Umm Salamah, the wife of the Prophet, that the Prophet said:"The woman whose husband has died should not wear clothes that are dyed with safflower or red clay, and she should not use dye nor kohl

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا تَجْتَنِبُ الْحَادَّةُ مِنَ الثِّيَابِ الْمُصْبَغَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Dyed Clothes Should Be Avoided By The Woman In Mourning
